Name: Invasion Vill
About the game: On his journey, the unnamed protagonist is captured and placed in an alien lair, now it will be necessary to solve puzzles and avoid getting caught to escape in just five attempts. The player will be able to hide under beds, cupboards or chests as long as the monster doesn't see him hiding. The monster: It appears to have excellent hearing, not appearing to have good eyesight, so it will run towards any loud sounds it hears, such as objects falling to the ground. Puzzles and Quests: Throughout the misadventure the player will encounter creatures, in exchange for help, something of great importance will be gained. Watch your step! One or the other place can be doomed, you can end up hurting yourself by staying immobile for a few moments.
